headline: Coinbase CFO talks Q3 beat, steps to becoming 'everything exchange'
summary: Coinbase Global (COIN) stock is jumping in Thursday's extended hours after the cryptocurrency exchange shared third quarter results that beat Wall Street forecasts: revenue of $1.9 billion and earnings per share of $1.50. Coinbase CFO Alesia Haas sits down with Yahoo Finance executive editor Brian Sozzi to discuss the crypto platform's growth, new USDC offerings, the company's vision as an "everything exchange," and the next step for digital asset regulation such as the CLARITY Act amid rising tokenization trends. For more expert insight and the latest market action, click here.

headline: Coinbase Reports Third-Quarter Profit Jump
summary: Coinbase Global’s profit and revenue rose in the third quarter, fueled by an increase in trading and surge in assets on the exchange.  Total revenue rose to $1.9 billion from $1.2 billion a year ago.  Transaction revenue nearly doubled to more than $1 billion from $573 million a year ago.

headline: Coinbase’s Earnings Beat Signals That the Crypto Firm Has Broken Out of Its Slump
summary: Coinbase Global  reported robust third-quarter earnings Thursday afternoon, beating earnings and revenue expectations on higher transaction revenue.  Coinbase reported third-quarter revenue of $1.9 billion, up 55% from the year-ago quarter, and earnings of $1.50 a share.  Transaction revenue of $1.0 billion was up 37% from the same time a year ago, and subscription and services revenue of $747 million rose 14%, while total operating expenses declined 9% to $1.4 billion.

headline: Decentralized crypto exchange dYdX plans for US market entry by year-end
summary: (Reuters) -One of the top decentralized cryptocurrency trading platforms, dYdX, is preparing to enter the U.S. market by the end of the year, in a shift for the derivatives-focused exchange that was previously not available to American users, the president of dYdX told Reuters in an interview.  Unlike centralized exchanges like Coinbase and Kraken that act as the intermediary between buyers and sellers, decentralized platforms like dYdX aim to cut out the middleman and allow users to transact directly on a blockchain network, which powers cryptocurrencies.  DYdX specializes in perpetual contracts, a type of derivative that lets traders speculate on the price of an asset without actually owning it, and unlike traditional futures, does not have an expiration date.

headline: Coinbase Reports Earnings Today. Why the Crypto Firm Could Break Out of Its Slump.
summary: Coinbase Global  reports third-quarter earnings Thursday afternoon, giving the cryptocurrency behemoth a chance to get back on track in what has been a rough second half of the year.  Shares of Coinbase rocketed 52% higher through July, buoyed by rising crypto prices, regulatory momentum, and the company’s inclusion in the  It’s been a slog since then.  The stock plummeted 17% on Aug. 1 after second-quarter earnings results showed a 39% drop in transaction revenue—and Coinbase is yet to claw back those losses.
